name: Arannis

specialAbilities.name: Fey Ancestry
specialAbilities.description: Advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put the elf to sleep.

specialAbilities.name: Spellcasting
specialAbilities.description: Arannis is a 5th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 16, +8 to hit with spell attacks). He has the following spells prepared: Cantrips (at will): Fire Bolt, Mage Hand, Minor Illusion. 1st level (4 slots): Mage Armor, Magic Missile, Shield. 2nd level (3 slots): Misty Step, Scorching Ray. 3rd level (2 slots): Counterspell, Fireball.

personality: Curious and always eager to learn new things.
ideals: Knowledge. The path to power and self-improvement is through knowledge.
bonds: I sold my soul for knowledge. I hope to do great deeds and win it back.
flaws: I am easily distracted by the promise of information.
